gos14.connect_db()[source]¶

Connects to the specific database.

gos14.entries()[source]¶

If methods == ‘POST’, a new entry is created, if methods == ‘GET’, a list of entries is displayed.

gos14.get_db()[source]¶

Opens a new database connection if there is none yet for the current application context.
